var quizQuestions = [

/*
  PVD scale for the LEARNOISE ONLINE PROJECT 
  by VS March 2020
*/

{
  question: "Please indicate how strongly you agree or disagree with the following statements",
  answers: [
          {
              type: "Continue",
              content: "Continue"
          }
          ],
      qtype: "button", // to be maybe changed 
      questionId: 0,
      surveytag: 'pvd', 
      title: '', // to be changed 
      constraint: [
        {min: ""},
        {max: ""}
      ] 
},

{   
      question:"It really bothers me when people sneeze without covering their mouth", 

      answers: [{
         type: "pvd-1",
